method.name: getRemainingDailyQuota
method.doc: Returns the number of remaining emails a user can send for the rest of the day.

argument.name: message
argument.doc: a JavaScript object representing an email message

argument.name: recipient
argument.doc: the addresses of the recipients, separated by commas

method.name: sendEmail
method.doc: Sends an email message with optional arguments.

argument.name: recipient
argument.doc: the addresses of the recipients, separated by commas

argument.name: options
argument.doc: a JavaScript object that specifies advanced parameters, as listed below

argument.name: to
argument.doc: the addresses of the recipients, separated by commas

argument.name: body
argument.doc: the body of the email in plain text
